channel.title: Comments on: Ace Is Such A Little Tiger
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Bonsai kittens are, thank God, a hoax: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonsai_Kitten http://www.snopes.com/critters/crusader/bonsai.asp
item.content:encoded:
Bonsai kittens are, thank God, a hoax:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonsai_Kitten
http://www.snopes.com/critters/crusader/bonsai.asp

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Sometime I find those things that seem starnge to you very strange.
Google it! There are even books on hating cats.
On a different matter. Did you hear about bonsai kittens? People are sick!
item.content:encoded:
Sometime I find those things that seem starnge to you very strange.

Google it! There are even books on hating cats.

On a different matter. Did you hear about bonsai kittens? People are sick!

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Saying that you don't like a pecific kind of animal always seemed strange to me. You hate all cats? HAve you never met a cat that you enjoyed playing with?
item.content:encoded: Saying that you don’t like a pecific kind of animal always seemed strange to me. You hate all cats? HAve you never met a cat that you enjoyed playing with?

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Before we hated cats we thought of adopting a Bengal cat. They realy look like tigers. Anyway I am glad we didn't :)
item.content:encoded: Before we hated cats we thought of adopting a Bengal cat. They realy look like tigers. Anyway I am glad we didn’t :)
